title: AddressData
description: Data about the components comprising an address.

region.description:
The region or state. In API versions 2018-05-22 and earlier, this field is called `state`.
Example: `"NC"`

street.description:
The full street address
Example: `"564 Main Street, APT 15"`

postal_code.description: The postal code. In API versions 2018-05-22 and earlier, this field is called `zip`.
